jobDescription: Nat Med Coach is looking to hire an intern for the summer. Nat Med Coach is a consortium of health coaches and holistic doctors offering virtual and in-person concierge health and wellness services to health-conscious individuals for a fraction the cost. Our Starter, Standard and Supreme Concierge Programs afford individuals monthly holistic services normally not covered by insurance.Nat Med Coach is looking for a bright, saavy and motivated student who is well versed in Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and Instagram + to organically promote a social media campaign from July 1 to September 30th. 10-20 hours per week. Work from home.Must be focused on conversions and analytics. Ready for a fun challenge. This is a non-paid position, with potential for commissions at the end, depending on sales conversions. Company shares an incentive.Please inquire with resume and expression of interest to Dr. Millie. We'd love to see what you can do to increase our brand profile.135 Clarkson AveBrooklyn, NY 11226-2001
